introduction: "We can, and always must, make our own future." If you are a fan of old Disney animated educational shorts, you'll dig the latest Tomorrowland promo, which shows the Origins of Plus Ultra and the futuristic city at the heart of Disney's sci-fi adventure. The narrator is sure to transport you back in time for this 3-minute lesson on technology and how it can change our lives for the better with some of the biggest innovators in history.
